archimate:DataObject.name: ConsequencePerformanceNotificationSpec
archimate:DataObject.documentation: TheÂ invariantÂ characteristicsÂ thatÂ defineÂ aÂ communicationÂ (notification)Â thatÂ occursÂ asÂ partÂ ofÂ aÂ PerformanceConsquence.Â AÂ NotificationÂ isÂ typicallyÂ one-sided;Â inÂ thatÂ noÂ ResponseÂ isÂ expected.Â ForÂ example;Â anÂ alarmÂ mayÂ beÂ raisedÂ asÂ theÂ resultÂ ofÂ aÂ PerformanceThresholdÂ beingÂ violated.
